Natural Language: -- By associativity of addition, can change a + (b + c) into (a + b) + c
-- By the commutativity of addition, can change (a + b) + c into (b + a) + c
-- By the associativity of addition, can change (b + a) + c into b + (a + c)
-- So we just need to show b + (a + c) = b + (a + c), which is true by reflexivity.
